channel.title: Broadcom on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Broadcom on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: 35 percent of VMware workloads expected to migrate elsewhere by 2028
item.description: “We are all addicted to hypervisors, and that needs to change."

item.title: OpenAI links up with Broadcom to produce its own AI chips
item.description: Industry is moving towards custom solutions in wake of Nvidia’s market domination.

item.title: Some VMware perpetual license owners are unable to download security patches
item.description: Customers will get patches at unspecified “later date,” Broadcom says.

item.title: More VMware cloud partners axed as Broadcom launches new invite-only program
item.description: Smaller businesses most likely to be affected as white-label cloud program is also ending.
